posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

Hexo 博客框架 Anatolo 主题 部署教程准备工作 安装node.js 安装git 安装hexo 部署教程 创建Blog文件夹，进入文件夹后，右键打开Git Bash Hexo初始化运行hexo init 导入Anatolo主题运行``git clone https://gitee.com/Lhcfl/hexo-theme-anatolo.git themes/Anatolo` 安装插件npm install --save hexo-renderer-pugnpm install --save hexo-renderer-stylusnpm install --save hexo-admin（用于在线后台管理）npm install --save hexo-deployer-git（用于部署网站）再执行一遍 npm install 将theme/Anatolo文件夹下的_config.example.yml原地复制一份副本，并改名为_config.yml 打开Blog文件夹下的_config.yml，找到最下方： 1234# Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deploymentdeploy: type: '' 将以上代码修改为： 12345# Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deploymentdeploy: type: git repo: https://e.coding.net/serverless-100007642281/hexo-blog/hexo-anatolo.git repo可以修改为你自己的仓库地址，如果想要推送到多个仓库，代码可作如下修改： 1234567# Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deploymentdeploy: - type: git repo: - type: git repo: Hexo构建静态页面运行hexo generate或者hexo g Hexo运行本地服务运行hexo server或者hexo s打开浏览器，输入localhost:4000并转到，即可看见博客页面了在Git Bash终端按下Ctrl + C可以终止服务 Hexo推送远程仓库运行hexo deploy或者hexo d Hexo在线编辑博客在运行本地服务之后，进入localhost:4000/admin页面即可在线编辑博客文档
